channel.title: Laggy Trades Need Fix! Please Help!
channel.description:
Server Base: 317 PI Error: Server lags all user's when 2 people do a trade. Reason: Unknown
Okay, I was trading a user to find out a item stats. I realized that was what was causing the lag on the server. I would like to try to fix this issue. I don't know what I should look at, or where it would be located. I'm guessing it's server sided due to the servers lagging. Does anyone know the issue causing this?

item.title: Laggy Trades Need Fix! Please Help!
